cast.title: Ghosts Galore
cast.overview: Veteran Lo Lieh, once again playing an evil black-magic priest, unleashes some particulary nasty Japanese ghosts on a peaceful Chinese village.

cast.title: The Pure and the Evil
cast.overview: The story of two friends finishing school and beginning adult life.

cast.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
cast.overview: Three lotharios vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School, an extremely non-monastic institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion, in this strange and erotic farce of the classic 36th Chamber Of Shaolin.

cast.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
cast.overview: A forerunner to the new wave gambling films, this is one of Wong Jing's first hits--before he would go on to dominate Hong Kong cinema for the next two decades. Although rife with Japanese spies, Shanghai tycoons, beautiful starlets, and enough intrigue to keep 007 happy, Bond himself would be no match for the heroes' skill at mahjong and other games Hong Kong gamblers play--proving that the cube is often mightier than the baccarat card.

cast.title: Top Fit
cast.overview: A married woman, fed up with her cheating husband, decides to do some cheating herself.

cast.title: Hex vs. Witchcraft
cast.overview: A compulsive gambler weds a ghost who helps and hinders him in both horrid and hilarious ways.
